Reference: Winter dark/deep, 23C for foundation

Was so excited for these lip tints that I bought 3 colors: 11, 13, and 14. The packaging is so dainty and beautiful, very much giving fairy vibes. The colors are gorgeous, pigmentation is good, and leave a nice tint. I also didn't notice much transfer left on the cup after drinking water, which is a huge plus!

Highly recommend~
